author: khaosmos93
body:
Improvement of 'valid muon hits cut' and 'matched station cut' within high pT muon ID.
Details about the improvement and their performance can be found in [1].

[1] https://indico.cern.ch/event/766895/contributions/3184188/attachments/1739394/2814214/IdTrigEff_HighPtMu_Min_20181023_v2.pdf
title: Improvement of muon::isHighPtMuon
